author: Aisha Sharpe
description: A Maple Rum Old Fashioned served straight-up with chocolate bitters. And it does indeed taste reminiscent of Tootsie Roll chews.
name: Tootsie Roll
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
